overview:
A serial global entrepreneur, acting as CEO of Tweegee.com and board member in a number of external startups.

Over 10 years of Internet experience in Business & Product Development, with vast Marketing expertise in the Youth and Tween Market.

Sold his first startup at age 27 and lead his second; Tweegee.com from a garage stage to a successful global company that raised over $12M in funds and within 2 years became the leading web platform for kids in Russia, Turkey and Israel with new successful activities in Argentina & Brazil heading towards the rest of LATAM and Europe.

Have a successful monetization track records working with global companies like Universal, Ikea, Pepsi-Co, Toyota, CN, Unilever and many more in the brand awareness world.

A large part of Shay’s success is with his ability to identify market needs quickly, and adapt them towards user needs, vast experience in UI & UX keeping fresh with new ways to empower new requirements, and the ability to track market voids and position them towards company growth.

Shay’s currently working on bringing more ideas to Life, soon to be revealed.
